description: The basic monetary unit for Haku.
func: (msg) => msg.util.reply('you use this for exchange, what else did you expect?')

description: Collect all 3 and get a legendary item.
func: (msg, inv) => { const cards = inv.resolve(['1card', '2card', '3card']); if (!cards) return msg.util.error('you do not have all 3 cards.'); for (const card of cards) inv.consume(card); inv.update('sanc\'s pantsu'); return msg.util.success('you combined the cards and got a legendary item!'); }

(msg, inv) => { const cards = ['1card', '2card', '3card']; const card = cards[Math.floor(Math.random() * cards.length)]; inv.consume('card pack'); inv.update(card); return msg.util.success(`you got a **${card}**!`); }
